remarks: A set containing the zero element of a module over a nonzero ring is always linearly dependent.  (Contributed by AV, 14-Apr-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 27-Apr-2019.)
statement: el0ldepsnzr $p |- ( ( ( M e. LMod /\ ( Scalar ` M ) e. NzRing ) /\ S e. ~P ( Base ` M ) /\ ( 0g ` M ) e. S ) -> S linDepS M ) $.
